parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the crankshaft position sensor can cause the vehicle to stall or shut down suddenly, leaving the driver stranded and potentially causing accidents or injuries.
symptoms: The vehicle stalls or shuts down suddenly
often without warning
and may not restart for an extended period; the vehicle may experience backfiring
loss of power
and illumination of traction lights on the dashboard; in severe cases
the engine may catch on fire.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the gear cluster display can cause the driver to lose visibility of the current gear, leading to confusion and potential accidents, especially when shifting gears at high speeds.
symptoms: The gear cluster display is faded or not visible
making it difficult or impossible to determine the current gear
leading to uncertainty while driving.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the transmission can cause the vehicle to unexpectedly shift into gear, leading to loss of control and potential accidents.
symptoms: The transmission makes a loud noise
the vehicle shifts into gear unexpectedly
the vehicle continues to move despite being in neutral
the transmission slips or hesitates when shifting gears.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the ABS control module can cause the loss of anti-lock braking system (ABS) functionality, leading to increased stopping distances and potentially causing accidents.
symptoms: Intermittent or constant ABS and ESP warning lights
loss of ABS functionality
error code C1120 ("Standstill calibration of yaw rate sensor erroneous").

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The transmission disengagement after ABS activation can cause the vehicle to lose power and momentum, leading to a loss of control and potentially causing accidents.
symptoms: The vehicle's transmission disengages after ABS activation
causing the engine to rev as if in neutral
loss of connection between the engine and transmission
delayed engagement of the transmission.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: A crack in the passenger-side airbag cover can potentially lead to the airbag deploying unexpectedly, causing injury or accidents while driving.
symptoms: A visible crack along the passenger-side front airbag on the dashboard.
